name: Camping
description (text): A really hard and time consuming merit badge all about camping!

name: Chess
description (text): Learn the basics of playing chess!

name: Citizenship in the Community
description (text): Learn to be a good person in your community!

name: Citizenship in the Society
description (text): Learn how to help out the society and change it for the better!

name: Citizenship in the Nation
description (text): Learn how to be a good citizen within your nation!

name: Citizenship in the World
description (text): Learn how to be a good human being in the world!

name: Communications
description (text): A merit badge dedicated to helping you with public speech skills which are very important.

name: Cycling
description (text): This merit badge teaches you how to operate a bike on a more advanced level.

name: Cooking
description (text): A challenging merit badge that tests your cooking skills!

name: Emergency Preparedness
description (text): A merit badge that teaches you the most optimal steps to take when an emergency hits.

name: Environmental Science
description (text): Learn how the ecosystem works and develop plans to protect it against pollution!

name: Family Life
description (text): Learn how to become a good family member!

name: First Aid
description (text): An important merit badge that teaches you how to perform first aid! This can save a life in the future!

name: Lifesaving
description (text): Learn how to save a drowning person safely!

name: Personal Fitness
description (text): Learn how to stay fit and healthy!

name: Sustainability
description (text): A merit badge dedicated to teaching you best practices to a cleaner environment!

name: Swimming
description (text): An important merit badge that teaches you how to swim!
